byline.original: By ALAN RAPPEPORT and YAMICHE ALCINDOR

lead_paragraph: Several core members of Our Revolution, which was publicly announced on Wednesday, have already quit amid concerns over its leadership and financing.

headline.print_headline: New Sanders Political Group Is Met by a Staff Revolt
headline.main: Bernie Sanders’s New Political Group Is Met by Staff Revolt

snippet: Several core members of Our Revolution, which was publicly announced on Wednesday, have already quit amid concerns over its leadership and financing....
abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders of Vermont unveils Our Revolution, political organization focused on addressing economic inequality and special interests; entity may already in trouble since most of its staff resigned due to appointment of former campaign manager Jeff Weaver as leader; critics fault Weaver for mismanaging politician's presidential bid, and group for getting tax status that allows it to accept anonymous donations--practice senator condemned while campaigning.
